question: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabizaga ashobora kunyuranaho:
answers: c) igihe umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga kiri imbere ye amweretse ikimenyetso kimwemerera kunyuranaho

question: Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga yakwitondera iki mbere yuko y’injira  munzira  banyuramo bazengurutse ?
answers: a) ibinyabiziga bimuturuka inyuma umuvuduko bifite n’uburyo bimwegereye
b) ibinyabiziga biturutse ibumoso bwe n’umuvuduko bifite n’intera iri hagati ye nabyo
c) ibinyabiziga biturutse iburyo n’umuvuduko bifite  ni intera iri hagati ye nabyo
d) ibinyabiziga bimututse imbere , umuvuduko bifite n’intera iri hagati ye nabyo

question: Ibyapa by’inyongera bishobora kumenyesha.
answers: b) ubugerure cyangwa amarengamategeko rusange cyangwa ibibujijwe ndetse n’ibitegetswe byihariye
c) a na b ni ibisubizo by' ukuri

question: Umuyobozi ubonye ko hari undi umukurikiye ashaka kumunyuraho agomba kubahiriza ibi bikurikira
answers: a) kwegera i ruhande rw’iburyo bw’umuhanda
d) a na  c ni byo bisubizo by’ukuri

question: Amatara maremare y’ikinyabiziga agomba kuzimwa mu bihe bikurikira:
answers: a) Iyo umuhanda umurikiye umuyobozi abasha kureba muri metero 20
b) Iyo ikinyabiziga kigiye kubisikana n’ibindi

question: Ikinyabiziga kibujijwe guhagarara akanya kanini aha hakurikira :
answers: a) Ahatarengeje  metero 1 imbere cyangwa inyuma y’ikinyabiziga gihagaze akanya gato cyangwa kanini
b) Ahantu hari ibimenyetso bibuza byabugenewe
c) Aho abanyamaguru banyura mu muhanda ngo bakikire inkomyi

question: Icyapa kivuga “icyerekezo gitegetswe” kigizwe n’ikirango cy’ibara :
Kunyuranaho bikorerwa he?
answers: c) Iburyo iyo unyura ku nyamaswa

question: Uburyo bukoreshwa kugirango ikinyabiziga kigende gahoro igihe feri idakora neza babwita:
answers: b) Feri yo guhagarara umwanya munini

question: Mu gihe  utwaye ikinyabiziga uva kuri A ugana kuri B,  Iki kimenyetso kiri mu muhanda kivuze iki ?
answers: a)  Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga ashobora kunyuranaho arenze umurongo wera udacagaguye
b) Umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga abujijwe kunyuranaho arenze imirongo yera
d) Abayobozi b’ibinyamitende gusa bemerewe kunyuranaho barenze umurongo wera udacagaguye

question: Ibyapa biburira n' ibyo gutambuka mbere birangwa:
answers: a) ishusho mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura , ubuso bwera n’ ikiranga mu ibara ry’umukara
b) ishusho mpandeshatu mw’ibara ritukura,ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikiranga mu ibara ry’umukara
c) ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura,ubuso bw’ubururu n’ikiranga mu ibara ry’umukara
d) ishusho y’uruziga mw’ibara ritukura,ubuso bwera n’ikiranga mu ibara ry’umukara

question: Igihe umuyobozi w’ikinyabiziga atwaye mu muhanda urombereje w’ibice byinshi  agomba kugendera mu kihe gice   cy’umuhanda ?
answers: a) Kugendera mugice icyo aricyo cyose kirimo ibinyabiziga bike
b) Kugendera kugice cy’ibumoso  keretse ushaka gusohokera iburyo
c) Kugendera mu gice cy’iburyo bw’umuhanda keretse ushaka kunyuranaho
d) Ntagutwarira  mu ruhande rw’iburyo bw’umuhanda kuko hagenewe imodoka ziremereye  n’imodoka  nini zitwara abantu.

question: Ahatari mu nsisiro umuvuduko ntarengwa mu isaha wa velomoteri ni:
Umurongo uciyemo uduce umenyesha ahegereye umurongo ushobora kuzuzwa n’uturanga gukata tw’ibara ryera utwo turanga cyerekezo tumenyesha :
answers: A) Igisate cy’umuhanda abayobozi bagomba gukurikira
C) Igabanurwa ry’umubare w’ibisate by’umuhanda mu cyerekezo bajyamo
D) A na C nibyo bisubizo by'ukuri

question: Umurongo ucagaguye uvuga ko buri muyobozi abujijwe kuwurenga uretse mu gihe:
answers: a) Agomba kunyura ku kindi kinyabiziga
c) Guhindukira cyangwa kujya mu kindi gice cy’umuhanda

question: Ishusho y’icyapa kivuga "ugukikira" bitegetswe ni :
Ikinyabiziga cyose cyangwa ibinyabiziga bigenda bigomba kugira:
answers: C) A na B ni ibisubizo by'ukuri

question: Ku byerekeye kwerekana ibinyabiziga n’ukumurika kwabyo ndetse no kwerekana ihindura ry’ibyerekezo byabyo. Birabujijwe gukora andi matara cyangwa utugarurarumuri uretse ibitegetswe ariko ntibireba amatara akurikira:
answers: b) Amatara ari imbere mu modoka

question: Iyo umuhanda ugabanijemo ibisate bibiri kandi ugendwamo mu byerekezo byombi umuyobozi abujijwe :
Muri ibi byapa ni ubuhe bwoko bw’ibyapa bitegeka  byo mu muhanda?
answers: a) ibiri mw’ishusho y’urukiramende  n’umuzenguruko w’umuhondo
b) ibiri  mw’ishusho ya mpande eshatu mu n’uzenguruko mw’ibara ry’ubururu
c) ibiri mw’ishusho y’uruziga n’umuzenguruko mw’ibara ry’umutuku
d) ibiri mw’ishusho ya mpande enye  zingana mubuso bw’umukara
